original_text: I will arise and go to my father, and I will say to him, “Father, I have sinned against heaven and before you.
korean_text: 내가 일어나 아버지께 가서 이르기를 아버지 내가 하늘과 아버지께 죄를 지었사오니

sentences.original_text: I will arise and go to my father,
and I will say to him,
I have sinned against heaven and before you.
